snippet.title: Leaked Docs Show Amber Heard is Still Fighting Johnny Depp for Money | Splash News TV
snippet.description:
New reports claim leaked legal documents show Amber Heard is still fighting to get Johnny Depp to pay her legal fees, and said that she never violated the confidentiality provisions of their settlement. 

Subscribe now for the latest Daily Hollywood Celebrity Splash TV News: https://goo.gl/JaLP0U

Best Daily Splash News Daily Celebrity Playlist: https://goo.gl/QsxT0r

Amber Heard isn’t giving up her fight against Johnny Depp.

And her legal team is claiming Johnny has not held up his end of the bargain.

According to new documents that were obtained by E! News, Heard’s attorneys say the 53-year-old actors failed to pay the first two installments of their seven figure settlement as well as neglecting to transfer the title to their Range Rover into her name as well as the division of personal property.

She’s also requested that her legal fees – totaling a little over 35 thousand dollars – be taken care of.

In the docs, Heard wrote a written declaration regarding Johnny’s decision to try to give the money to a charity instead of her. She also wrote that he claimed she violated the confidentiality provisions of the Deal Point Memorandum by announcing that she would be donating her settlement to charities. She also points out that she made those donations in good faith and was responding to the leaks by Johnny’s agents bragging that she settled for substantially less than an earlier offer sum and attempting to label her as a gold digger. 

Heard and Depp announced their divorce back in May after reports claim the star was physically abusive.
